com.github.dandelion.core.config
Interface ConfigurationLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardConfigurationLoader
public interface ConfigurationLoader

Interface for all configuration loaders.

The default implementation is the StandardConfigurationLoader class but it can be replaced by another class that implements this interface thanks to the Context.

Since:
0.10.0
Author:
Thibault Duchateau

 Properties loadUserConfiguration()

Field Detail

DANDELION_CONFLOADER_CLASS

static final String DANDELION_CONFLOADER_CLASS
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

loadUserConfiguration

Properties loadUserConfiguration()

Load the user configuration which can be used to override the default one.

Once the bundle loaded, it is converted into Properties.

Returns:
the ResourceBundle containing the user configuration.
